cc: Before beginning a system evacuation, you would need to connect the AC machine to the vehicle, as demonstrated in Activity 1.
After a repair is completed, all the air and moisture need to be removed from the air conditioning system. Pulling a vacuum will remove all the air and moisture.

t1.cc: To begin, select the vacuum button.

t2.cc: Now set the timer for 15 minutes.

t4.cc: Rotate the low-side hand valve to open it.
t4.reportLabel: Open the low side hand valve.

t5.cc: Now rotate the high-side hand valve to open it.
t5.reportLabel: Open the hide side hand valve.

t6.cc: Now that the process has ended, rotate the low-side hand valve to close it.
t6.reportLabel: Close the low side hand valve.

t7.cc: Rotate to close the other valve.
t7.reportLabel: Close the high side hand valve.

cc: Since the pressure stayed at 30‚Äù Hg, the system vacuum is good and you can move on to charging the vehicle with refrigerant.
